en.VnetCreateDescription: Create a virtual network. A virtual network is comparable to VLANs and includes virtual switching. Complete the required fields and then review + create to create a new virtual network.
en.VnetInternetRouting: Add internet routing NAT gateway support
en.VnetOverwriteForce: Overwrite if a virtual network by the same name exists?
en.VnetHostname: Hostname to force host (else leave blank)
